snippet: When it comes to negotiating for better pay, women often hesitate, studies show. But new programs around the United States are aiming to eliminate those fears.
abstract: New programs across the country are aiming to teach women to overcome fears of negotiating for better pay, factor that is increasingly targeted as a cause of persistent pay gap between men and women.
